citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:04pm on 07-NOV-
2022.
The inspector arrived at the facility and left a voicemail at the number on file for the location. The inspector also knocked
on the entrance door. A second attempt was made to contact the facility by phone and the inspector was able to reach a
facility representative and confirm that no one was available to do an inspection.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:04pm on 07-NOV-
2022. 
 
The inspector arrived at the facility and left a voicemail at the number on file for the location. The inspector also knocked 
on the entrance door. A second attempt was made to contact the facility by phone and the inspector was able to reach a 
facility representative and confirm that no one was available to do an inspection. 
 
 
 
End Section
